profile: Bronson Johnson Seamless Eavestroughs has quickly become one of Ottawa's top choices for your water evacuation requirements!  We specialize in Eavestrough (Gutter) installation.  BJSE also provides Leaf Screen (Leaf Guard) protection.  We have exclusive rights to GT Premium Micro Leaf Screen which is ideal for metal roofing systems.   Our mission is to be Referred by our Customers, Revered by our Competitors and Respected by our Community.
products: We only use 0.032" thick 5 inch Seamless Eavestrough; Exclusive rights to the Hidden Hanger used in our installations; Leaf Guard, Leaf Screen; Environmentally friendly Rain Barrel installation.  Also, ask about our product that eliminates  "Tiger Stripes" which occur on white and light coloured eaves.
services: Eavestrough Installation, Eavestrough Repair, Eavestrough Cleaning, Removal of Old Troughs, Tiger Stripe cleaning.
brands: Englert product line, GT Premium Microscreen Leaf Guard, T-Rex (Alu-Rex) Leaf Screen.
specialities: B.J.S.E is the only company in Ottawa to specialize in the installation of.032" thick Aluminum Eavestroughs which is significantly stronger than standard .023", .024" and .027" material used by our competitors. The advantage of the thicker gauge is strength and integrity at the same price!
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, Credit Card and e-transfer
diplomas: All of our crew members have completed the Fall Protection Certification
warranty_terms: 5 year warranty on workmanship and 20 year manufacturer's warranty on materials.
name: Bronson Johnson Seamless Eavestroughs

profile:
At Excel Building & Roofing we are "On top of what matters most" with specialties in residential and commercial roofing and renovations in the Ottawa and surrounding area. As an Ottawa contractor we deliver the best in quality, workmanship and insist the job is done right the first time. 

With all the chaos that comes with our day to day lives we know that any home project, needed or wanted, can seem both overwhelming and out of reach. At Excel Building & Roofing we are with you every step of the way.

Our team has over 25 years combined experience in the field and we are extremely motivated to make a change in the way this city views the construction industry. "A lot of companies are faceless and in it for a quick buck. This isn't just a "job" for us and our clients are not just "another project", this is how we make our living and support our family." 

Call us picky, but quality is a prerequisite and a bad job is simply unacceptable. We do not rush jobs and choose our materials and team very carefully to ensure it is done right the first time.

When you choose Excel you receive:
- A Green Company, we recycle 100% of materials removed from your home.
- Superior quality and workmanship   
- Always above standard materials and installation
- Constant management - during and after installation inspections 
- No hidden fees or extras, what we quote you is what you pay.

*** Ottawa Roofing experts***

profile:
Remember Me Roofing Inc services residential and commercial properties in the Ottawa region, offering industry leading 50 Year Warranties through our certification as GAF Contractors.

Our highly rated team takes pride in delivering quality workmanship and providing outstanding customer service to every homeowner. We emphasize honesty and integrity and are proud of the reputation we have built in our community and our commitment to give back.

Every member of our staff strives to make Remember Me Roofing a leader in the industry. Beyond providing a service, we are looking to build relationships by committing to being reliable and respectful to our customers. Our homeowners depend on us and we in turn give everything we have to each roof.

profile:
MARKELANGELO'S ROOFING serves the greater Ottawa area.  We are a professional and trustworthy company with a proven track record. We have fully trained, certified employees who specialize in specific installation procedures and focus 100% on quality control to ensure your satisfaction with the final product. 
 
As a testament to our exceptional level of service, our clients eagerly recommend us to friends and family. In fact, we built Markelangelo’s solely through word of mouth.

We are very aware of how our business impacts the environment. We contribute by participating in recycling programs available at local landfills. All garbage, shingles, metal and wood are separated before we take our dump trailers to these landfills. Each waste product is then put into its appropriate area of the landfill and processed. We save approximately a thousand tonnes of material being buried in landfills every year.
services: re-roofing, roof repairs, snow removal, gutter installation.
licenses: GAF Certified Green Roofer and Weather Stopper Contractor; BP Weather-Tite Certified Roofer
warranty_terms: 20 years on workmanship; lifetime on roofing materials
name: Markelangelo's

profile:
D. Ross Renovations and Roofing Have Been Kanata's Roofing EXPERT for over 23 YEARS! We've seen it all and repaired every possible problem! 

Here's Why You Will Want To Choose D. Ross Renovations & Roofing For Your Next Project:

*23 YEARS IN BUSINESS WITH A SOLID A+ BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU RATING

*THOUSANDS OF PROJECTS COMPLETED ON TIME & ON-BUDGET

*10/10 HOMESTARS REVIEWS

*FAIR PRICES & NO HIDDEN COSTS

*FULLY LICENSED AND INSURED WITH LIABILITY INSURANCE & WSIB

* THE BEST WORKMANSHIP WARRANTY IN OTTAWA - 15 TO 20 YEARS

*THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS IN THE ROOFING INDUSTRY

*ROOFING INSTALLATIONS MET OR EXCEED MANUFACTURER' INSTRUCTIONS

*FREE IN-HOUSE DESIGNER TO ASSIST YOU WITH SHINGLE SELECTION

*CONTRACTUAL AGREEMENT THAT PROTECTS YOU FROM LAWSUITS

*YOU GET PAID $150 FOR EVERY NEW ROOF REFERRAL


YOU GET THE BEST ROOFING SYSTEM IN THE INDUSTRY
We are proud to offer you the highest quality roofing materials from trusted manufacturers, Malarkey, GAF, Owen's Corning & CertainTeed. 

All D. Ross Renovations & Roofing installations exceed industry and manufacturers' standards. This is vital as incorrect installation of the roofing system will void your Manufacturer' Lifetime Warranty. Sadly, we witness local roofing contractors improperly installing shingles nearly every day. 

Rest assured you will have the best Manufacturer's Warranty available in the industry on the materials we install, as well.


YOU CAN BREATHE EASY KNOWING YOU ARE PROTECTED
D. Ross Renovations & Roofing is Licensed and Fully Insured with Liability Insurance & WSIB. If an accident happened on your property you are legally protected from liability, lawsuits, and property damage costs.

In addition, we provide you with a legally binding Contractual Agreement that assures you that we will do what we say - when we say we will do it. This contractual agreement also lists our business license and liability insurance for you to verify.  


D. ROSS RENOVATIONS & ROOFING OFFERS THE BEST WORKMANSHIP WARRANTY
You get exceptional, fast service and reasonable rates, along with our 15 & 20 Year Workmanship Warranty. We have the best Workmanship Warranty of all Ottawa roofing contractors.


D. ROSS RENOVATIONS & ROOFING’S PRICING IS FAIR, HONEST, AND UPFRONT.
You will never get an invoice for thousands of dollars more than your quotation. This happens far too frequently in the roofing industry - beware. 

We offer the industry's best quality materials and exceptional workmanship at the lowest possible cost. Along with our everyday fair prices, we also offer promotions! Visit our website at drossroofing.com to learn how you can save!

Our Customer Referral Program pays you $150 for every new roof installed by your referral. This really adds up $$$ in 10 or more years!



THE D. ROSS PROS WILL TAKE CARE OF ALL YOUR EXTERIOR RENOVATION NEEDS
There is no need for you to hire multiple contractors to handle your exterior renos. D. Ross Renovations & Roofing does it all!


You’re in the best hands with us! D. Ross Renovations & Roofing has the experience to handle jobs of any complexity. Whether it be small residential repairs or large roofing projects, we undertake each project with professionalism and the highest quality workmanship. We’re available now to get started on your next project!


OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE US. SEE OUR 10/10 REVIEWS!

profile:
Rest Assured Roofing specializes in asphalt shingled roof removals and new roof installations. Our goal is to provide homeowners with an incredible experience from the moment they get in touch with us, to the final clean-up.

We offer an industry-leading, 10-year workmanship warranty that has helped us provide properties with an extensive range of roofing services such as residential roofing Ottawa, Emergency roof repair, guaranteeing excellent customer satisfaction. To extend the longevity of your roof, we utilize the highest quality material to ensure that you receive an incredible, and efficient roofing experience.

Fully Insured
Qualified in Certainteed installations as well as products
48-Hour Estimate Guarantee
24/7 Emergency Service

WARRANTY INFORMATION: 
We have passed both written testing and quality inspections to become certified with Certainteed. This allows us to provide our customers with an extended 50 year Surestart warrantee. What does that mean?
Well, SureStart offers the best coverage you can get on your  new roof and here is what it provides:

- 100% of materials:
All shingles required to repair or replace the defective product will be provided free. No exceptions.

- 100% of labor:
All labor required to repair defective shingles or apply new shingles to replace the defective shingles will be paid by CertainTeed, based on local fair market value for labor.

- Additional costs:
The cost of flashing, metal work, tear-off and disposal are included.

- Without prorating the costs: 
The cost of materials and labor are not prorated or otherwise reduced.

profile:
Established in 2008, Firon Roofing Inc. has grown to a full service roofing company offering Lifetime and Designer roofing systems to Ottawa and surrounding areas, with a focus on transparency, integrity and customer commitment.
Firon is an active member of the National Roofing Contractors Association, The Ottawa Chamber of Commerce, an A+ member of the Better Business Bureau, and Certified through the GAF Manufacturer holding the status of Certified Weather Stopper Roofing Contractor and Certified Green Roofer.
Firon has been recognized in Profit Magazine (2012) as #9 in the Profit Hot 50 for Canada’s Top New Growth Companies and in the Ottawa Business Journal (2013) Fastest Growing Companies.
Firon Roofing Inc. remains committed to ongoing training, partnerships, and business development, through a passion for education and our community.
services: Re-roofing, new construction roofing, designer and lifetime roofing system, 24hr emergency services, repair services
name: Firon Roofing Inc.

profile:
COMPANY MILESTONE: On budget, on time, 100%  customer satisfaction every time; for over forty years and always making our customers the number one priority.

5 year townhouse/condo project (2015-2019). 

Custom Roofing Ltd., locally owned and operated, has been providing high quality roofing services to Ottawa and its surrounding west end areas since 1980; providing excellent workmanship.

Our expertise lies in all areas of shingle roofing, both residential and commercial and provide consulting services related to our expertise. 

We are not, " a Jack-of-all-trades", but a master of one!

Custom Roofing Ltd.'s Accomplishments: 
* HomeStars "Best of 2014" in Ottawa for Roofing
* Better Business Bureau A+ / Honour Roll for 20 years. Complaint Free Status.


Please contact us for a Free Estimate
Office:          (613) 839-1952
Text:             (613)-294-8264
Email:           jacqui@customroofingottawa.com
Web page:  www.customroofingottawa.com
service_area: Serving Ottawa and its Surrounding Areas including: Ottawa including: West, South, Central, Alta Vista, Barrhaven, Carp, Cedargrove, Dunrobin, Fraserdale, Hunt ...
services:
We specialize in all areas of shingle roofing, both commercial and residential. 

We repair, maintain, and provide consulting services related to our expertise. 

Additionally, we offer other services such as: Roof inspections, Roof Snow and ice removal, and the installation of skylights. 

Finally, we provide Consulting Services to real estate agents, property managers, and architects.

profile:
For over ten years, Sunrise Roofing has developed a reputation for excellence in workmanship and customer service. Founder, Bill Onion is a hands-on owner who works hard to ensure his customers get the personal service they deserve and the value they expect. Bill oversees a highly skilled crew of professional roofers and prides himself on his team’s punctuality, strong work ethic and top quality service.

Sunrise Roofing is a company that cares. If you’re sick of having your calls go unanswered and tired of companies who make promises they don’t keep, look no further. With a proven reputation and reliable track record, your roofing experience is bound to look at lot brighter at Sunrise.
services:
Installation of new shingle roofing and metal roofing
Replacement or repair of existing shingle roofing and metal roofing
Installation of new custom-fitted eavestroughs
Replacement or repair of existing eavestroughs
Installation of new skylights
Replacement or repair of existing skylights
Rooftop snow removal
name: Sunrise Roofing
